summary: Aggregate view of the cache: number of sources, storage usage, average staleness, and environment details.

usage.description: Machine-friendly summary (ideal for dashboards or health checks).
Human-readable report with totals, cache paths, and index sizes.

agent_use_cases: Capture baseline metrics before bulk updates or cleanups.
Alert when total index size or staleness exceeds operational budgets.
Combine with `blz list --status` to drill into outlier sources.
